name: Nightmares (itch) (ZYGER)
description:
This is a game created for the 3rd Blackthornprod game jam. It was created by Zyger and Syviery within the game jam period (around 6 days). Everything in the game was created during this time period, including graphics, programming, sounds, particles etc. Everything was also created by Zyger and Syviery and nothing was free content that was downloaded.

This is a puzzle platforming game, that takes place in the players nightmare. where he has to learn a valuable lesson of less is more. The main mechanic of the game is the ability of comparing object to one another. For example making objects smaller, larger or equal to each other depending on its original size. The game is momentum based therefore the player needs to be careful not to move to fast in trickier situations.

There is cutscenes within this game but subtitles are provided for anyone who would prefer too read those. the audio can also be muted at the main menu.

The progress you make will be saved! unless you are playing the browser verion.

Thank you for playing and hope you enjoyed it :D
